statements: DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 100 AND customer_id = 10
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Transaction' AND alert_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 1 AND alert_type LIKE '%fraud%';
DELETE FROM alert WHERE alert_type = 'Fraudulent Transaction';
DELETE FROM transaction WHERE customer_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'Withdrawal';
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Fraud' AND alert_date < '2022-01-01';
